description: For a picture-perfect treat to wow your guests, work smarter â€“ not harder. This recipe hacks a Woolworths mud cake to create a show stopping dessert.
name: Easy Chocolate Bark Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pkt dark chocolate, broken into pieces
1 pkt Dollar Sweets Cake Topper, to decorate
1 pkt Dollar Sweets Gold & Silver Candles, to decorate

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place chocolate in a microwavesafe bowl. Microwave on high for 2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds, or until melted. Spread chocolate over prepared tray. Stand until set.
Place one mud cake, icingside up, on a serving plate or cake stand. Top, icing-side down, with second cake. Spread sides and top with frosting.
Break chocolate into large pieces. Press chocolate bark into sides and top of cake to cover. Decorate with cake topper and candles to serve.
